thread.title: The latest data shows where Amazon might be headed next - ... - SFGate
thread.title_full: The latest data shows where Amazon might be headed next - ... - SFGate - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: SFGate
title: The latest data shows where Amazon might be headed next - ... - SFGate
text:
Amazon is continuing to bulk up its fulfillment-center network, indicating it's serious about stepping into a territory historically owned by companies like UPS, FedEx, and DHL: the logistics and transportation business. According to new data by the e-commerce software maker ChannelAdvisor, Amazon has added 21 new logistics facilities globally over the last 12 months, up 14% from last year, bringing the total to 173 facilities worldwide.
 SFGate.
